raw_curl_login: curl -s -k -c "$COOKIE_JAR" -b "$COOKIE_JAR" -X POST -H 'Authorization: X-Sah-Login' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-sah-ws-4-call+json' -H "Origin: http://$IP" --data '{"service":"sah.Device.Information","method":"createContext","parameters":{"applicationName":"webui","username":"'"$USER"'","password":"'"$PASS"'"}}' "http://$IP/ws" | tee "$COOKIE_JAR.sah.json" >/dev/null; CONTEXT_ID=$(sed -n 's/.*contextID\"\s*:\s*\"\([^\"]\+\)\".*/\1/p' "$COOKIE_JAR.sah.json"); printf "%s" "$CONTEXT_ID" > "$COOKIE_JAR.ctx"
raw_curl_reboot: CONTEXT_ID=$(tr -d '\r\n' < "$COOKIE_JAR.ctx"); curl -s -k -c "$COOKIE_JAR" -b "$COOKIE_JAR" -X POST -H "Authorization: X-Sah $CONTEXT_ID" -H "X-Context: $CONTEXT_ID" -H 'Content-Type: application/x-sah-ws-4-call+json' -H "Origin: http://$IP" --data '{"service":"NMC","method":"reboot","parameters":{"reason":"GUI_Reboot"}}' "http://$IP/ws" >/dev/null
